title: Re-route a Truck Due to Road Closure
description: A dispatcher receives an alert about an unexpected highway closure on a driver's route. They must re-route the driver.

tasks.description: Receive a traffic alert about a major accident and highway closure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher is aware of the road closure.

tasks.description: Identify all trucks whose current routes are affected by the closure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies one truck that is routed onto the closed highway.

tasks.description: Calculate an optimal detour route for the affected truck.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new route is generated that bypasses the closure.

tasks.description: Send the new route and instructions to the driver's in-cab navigation device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver receives the updated route.
